name: Tap N Bump - Improve your Brain + Cognitive Skills
name_original: Tap N Bump - Improve your Brain + Cognitive Skills
description:
Tap n Bump is an easy to play but difficult to master brain game. It is designed to test your reflexes and ability to think fast. You can improve your brain reflex skills by playing this game regularly as you have to time your bump right.

This game was designed to be tough the better you get at it. So please, don't get frustrated. Give this game time and you will see your scores improve. That is how it was designed.

In order to improve your brain, and mental fitness, you must work on it. This game was designed to make you work on improving the health of your brain.
You will also improve you motor skills and your mind and body co-ordination. You will to train your eye to make sure you hit the correct colors. It is also a fun app as it is colorful. So you will have fun as well as a good brain workout.
